messages.message: We're seeing an issue where our autogenerated docs about environment variables (https://instabase.com/docs/platform-admin/services/env-docs-svc/index.html) aren't matching what's in the code base. Heymian has always helped with autogenerated docs before. @Kerry can you recommend someone else to help with troubleshooting? cc: @Chris Cowell
Not urgent! I should have said.

It looks like the makefile in the `instabase` repo that generates the docs is not working as expected, since I think nothing has changed from the point where we pick up the `.md` and `.rst` files generated by the `make` task.
So I think we need someone familiar with `/webserver/webapp/Makefile` in the `instabase` repo, and in particular with the `fetch-docs` task in that file.
